name: The Sacrifice of William Stoughton
description: The Sacrifice of William Soughton is about a farmer who takes revenge on the witches who set his village on fire. During the hunt , William gets cursed by the witches and something unexpected happenned ! The curse had to control his movements and make him their puppet , but instead it made the witches movements mimic Williams ones. The Gameplay goes around the mécanic of the movement mimic , when the player moves , the witches also does. To get revenge the player has to solve the puzzle and make the witch burn at the stake.
